meanings.definition: A type of building made of a dark brown sandstone.
meanings.sent1: The old brownstones in the city have a classic charm.
meanings.sent2: We walked past the row of brownstones on our way to the park.
meanings.sent3: The brownstones on the street looked like giant chocolate bars.
meanings.sent4: The brownstones stood like ancient guardians along the avenue.
meanings.sent5: The sunlit brownstones glowed warmly in the afternoon light.

meanings.definition: A row of houses built of brownstone.
meanings.sent1: The brownstones in the neighborhood all had unique front doors.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate details on the brownstones as she walked by.
meanings.sent3: The brownstones seemed to huddle together like a group of friends.
meanings.sent4: The row of brownstones stretched out like a welcoming embrace.
meanings.sent5: The brownstones lined the street like soldiers standing at attention.
